item.title: Wow wow wow... it's been a long time!
item.description: Wow wow wow... it's been a long time!

item.title: Oh god, the release is tomorrow
item.description: Oh god, the release is tomorrow

item.title: Six days before the release :')
item.description: It's time for a new blog post!

item.title: Ten days before the release \o/
item.description: The game will be released in 10 days...

item.title: Candy Box 2 release date!
item.description: I'm finally ready to announce the exact date of the game's release : October the 24th! :)

item.title: Some news
item.description: It's been a week since the last blog post, and I've been working hard on the game! I don't have any big subject to tell you about this time, so I'm just going to share interesting things, and request your advices! :)

item.title: Inventory system in Candy Box 2
item.description: Hello everyone, time for a new blog post!

item.title: The local saving system + a troll!
item.description: In this second blog post, I'll explain briefly how the local saving system works, before showing you a screenshot from Candy Box 2 that gives you an idea of the kind of ascii art we made for the game :-)

item.title: The very first post
item.description: Hi everyone! This is the first post :)
